extendedInfo.description: SSLStrip for Android(Root)For research purposes only. Please do not abuse this software.If you don't know what that, probably you don't need it.Open source project, feel free to improve it.https://github.com/crazyricky/SSLStrip-for-Android

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Wow really handy app, would it be possible to update the market version as it doesnt have the save out logs option the git hub has. Alas ive no idea how to compile with eclipse. Thanks again ;-) also only works on usb teather mode and not wifi theather on my desire
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Potential
reviews.comment: I wish I could get this to work! arpspoof (separate app) works on my phone, and can do all from a debian install but would really like an app, could I also request a icon so can leave running in the background
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Logging? Not so much.
reviews.comment: Great app as far as functionality goes, but there\'s no way to save the output. You better write you results down, or get used to making LOTS of screenshots.
reviews.author: Michael Baker

reviews.title: Works Perfectly
reviews.comment: Galaxy S3 connected to WPA2 protected wifi network working perfectly with all devices.
reviews.author: Daniel L\303\263pez

reviews.title: Figured it out,
reviews.comment: Was having problems at first figuring out exactly how this works, i thought this was a MITM sniffer like faceniff and droidsheep, but this is for tethering only. Good app,not quite what i was looking for as another alternitive but it works so why complain
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: FINALLY
reviews.comment: Great app, works Great, keep up the great work man cant wait to see more goodies implemented in this...Working on my galaxy NOTE
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Force closes A LOT cant even get it to stay open long enough to see if it\'s working. Evo 3d
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: issue with sgs2
reviews.comment: arpspoof is not working.  tested against multiple windows pc\'s.  Looking at bug report on github, im not the only one.  Wish it did. I will try again when I upgrade.  Thank you dev! edit: after reading other comments, it seems this is only working while tethering.
reviews.author: Eric Chastain

reviews.comment: Crashing on load in galaxy s3
reviews.author: Gulshan Vasson

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Wow this is perfectly amazing application. Worked on my motorola RAZR
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: https starts again after few minutes
reviews.comment: it is a good app. but it can only do sslstrip for few minutes only, after it the victim is again able to open website with https connection
reviews.author: Avixit Aparnathi

reviews.title: Hell yes!
reviews.comment: Very very awesome. Works like it\'s supposed to shows, full login login details in plain text. Running this on cm9 RC0-alpha2 on my HP-touchpad. Nicely done!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wicked
reviews.comment: I love this app but I have one problem the first time I downloaded this it worked like a charm  but now it doesn\'t work at all  Im using a nexus 4 4.2.2
reviews.author: Nafees Mohammed
